MT_PurchaseOrder.FooterText: ___________ Total net value excl. VAT 6.397,20 Drivers must speak, understand and read one of generally accepted languages of the supply or delivery location. For Brenntag locations in the Benelux the accepted languages are Dutch, English, French or German. This transport must be executed in compliance with the CEFIC Best Practice Guidelines for Safe (Un)Loading of Road Freight Vehicles. By accepting our Purchase Order you confirm that the product(s) you supply to us complies (comply) with the REACH Regulation. Required PPE on our site: safety glasses, safety shoes, high vis vest and helmet. Substances that are produced after 1st December 2010 must be labelled according to the new CLP/GHS regulation (EU) No. 1272/2008. If the goods are shipped from outside the EEA (European Economic Area) into the EEA territory: Your order confirmation should include your REACH registration Number as well as the Volume Certificate from your Only Representative. Alternatively provide evidence for REACH Exemption. In case no or incorrect Volume Certificate is provided we may cancel our order. Please send the volume certificate to: suppliers.reach@brenntag.nl (Brenntag Netherlands) or suppliers.reach@brenntag.be (Brenntag Belgium).
